bug.short_desc: Holding a key is not repeating the action

long_desc.thetext:
If i press and hold a arrow key, the play ground editor are not moving the cursor, and this is annoying for daily use.
The effect is observed on Ubuntu 10.04/10.10, language pt_Br (português from Brasil), qooxdoo 1.3, firefox 1.3.6, all in default installation.
